Sentece: Data from both studies indicate that the terminal elimination half-life is of the order of 8-10 h, and that there is no unexpected drug accumulation.
Title: Results of single and repeat dose studies of the oral matrix metalloproteinase inhibitor marimastat in healthy male volunteers.

Sentece: It has a terminal elimination half-life of 8-10 h which would support twice daily dosing in further clinical trials.
Title: Results of single and repeat dose studies of the oral matrix metalloproteinase inhibitor marimastat in healthy male volunteers.
